title: Edgar Allan Poe
creator_credit: Stuart O'Brien and Arthur G. Evans
brief_description: One of the first American writers of international importance, Poe became a widely read master of the short story, yet his life seemed a fabric of despair, failure, frustration and poverty. This film presents a sympathetic account of Poe’s life and work narrated by Lorne Greene. To conclude there is a reading of Poe’s famous poem, ANNABEL LEE
